GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.18.2
GSD.description:
bpf: Fix combination of jit blinding and pointers to bpf subprogs.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.2 by commit d106a3e96fca30e44081eae9c27aab28fc132a46, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 69c087ba6225b574afb6e505b72cb75242a3d844. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: bpf: Fix combination of jit blinding and pointers to bpf subprogs.
